item.title: 801 Final remarks
item.author: fname.lnameA Tkuleuven.be (Nele Mentens and Jo Vliegen)
item.description: Final remarks In these labs it was tried to show a different, more professional approach to verification. If there is one take away from these labs it should be: there is more to testing than writing a testbench that successfully executes 1 testvector. Through the use SystemVerilog, all the good of object oriented programming can be brought into hardware verification. Using the coverage capabilities that are by-design in SystemVerilog, is a flexible way to achieve a bug-free, working implementation.
